summary: A troubled group of children living on the same block are haunted by a talking dog named Labby who brings them on surreal hell-rides between different dimensions and time periods.
cast: Ruby Larocca|Brandon Slagle|Joey Smack|Victor Bonacore|Joshua Michael Greene|Linnea Quigley|M. dot Strange|Trent Haaga|Devanny Pinn|Carlos Bonilla|Swift Treweeke|Edward Bonacore|Jennifer English|Violet Riot|Emily Youcis|Will Da Beast|Ian Wright|Jay Longo|Meatsock|Jimmy ScreamerClauz
title: Where the Dead Go to Die
